name: Jazz 2 Internet Link File
summary: Learn about .J2I files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: More information about Jazz Jackrabbit 2 Online, including help with J2I files as well as a list of active multiplayer games, is available at the Jazz2Online website.

description: Text file containing Internet connection settings for a Jazz Jackrabbit 2 multiplayer game; includes the IP address of the server hosting the game; may be downloaded from websites that list active Jazz 2 online games.
